aircraft.value: Osprey Guardian - AC-9352-870 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Sensor fusion algorithm anomaly. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 19/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 21/09/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 26/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/09/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component.
